categories: Category:Confederacy of Independent Systems starship classes

nodes.text: The Commerce Guild corvette was a type of corvette belonging to the Commerce Guild that served in the Confederacy of Independent Systems during the Clone Wars. During the war, Commerce Guild corvettes and Commerce Guild bombers supported the larger Recusant-class light destroyer and Diamond-class cruisers as they defended planets off the Perlemian Trade Route such as Castell, Escarte, Felucia, Mooga, and Minntooine.
